channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualys,Inc. -- Container Scanning Connector Jenkins Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualys,Inc. -- Container Scanning Connector Jenkins Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-4777|2023-09-08T08:42:35.645Z -- qualys%2Cinc. -- container%20scanning%20connector%20jenkins%20plugin
item.description: An incorrect permission check in Qualys Container Scanning Connector Plugin 1.6.2.6 and earlier allows attackers with global Item/Configure permission (while lacking Item/Configure permission on any particular job) to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins and to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.Â
